info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 11:46PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN SIOUX, SOUTHEASTERN BURLEIGH, SOUTHEASTERN MORTON AND NORTHWESTERN EMMONS COUNTIES THROUGH 1230 AM CDT... At 1145 PM CDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles north of Menoken to 6 miles southeast of Lincoln to 6 miles northwest of Solen. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Menoken around 1150 PM CDT. Sterling around 1215 AM CDT. Cannon Ball around 1225 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Driscoll, Moffit, Hazelton Recreation Area, Fort Rice, Mckenzie and Huff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for south central North Dakota.
